verses.verse: Now Bezalel<WH1212> made<WH6213> the ark<WH727> of acacia<WH7848> wood;<WH6086> its length<WH753> was two and a half<WH2677> cubits,<WH520> and its width<WH7341> one and a half<WH2677> cubits,<WH520> and its height<WH6967> one and a half<WH2677> cubits;<WH520>
and he overlaid<WH6823> it with pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091> inside<WH4480> <WH1004> and out, and made<WH6213> a gold<WH2091> molding<WH2213> for it all<WH5439> around.<WH5439>

And he cast<WH3332> four<WH702> rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091> for it on its four<WH702> feet;<WH6471> even two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> on one<WH259> side<WH6763> of it, and two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> on the other<WH8145> side<WH6763> of it.
And he made<WH6213> poles<WH905> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086> and overlaid<WH6823> them with gold.<WH2091>
And he put<WH935> the poles<WH905> into the rings<WH2885> on the sides<WH6763> of the ark,<WH727> to carry<WH5375> it.
And he made<WH6213> a mercy<WH3727> seat<WH3727> of pure<WH2889> gold,<WH2091> two and a half<WH2677> cubits<WH520> long,<WH753> and one and a half<WH2677> cubits<WH520> wide.<WH7341>
And he made<WH6213> two<WH8147> cherubim<WH3742> of gold;<WH2091> he made<WH6213> them of hammered<WH4749> work,<WH4749> at the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the mercy<WH3727> seat;<WH3727>

one<WH259> cherub<WH3742> at the one<WH2088> end,<WH7098> and one<WH259> cherub<WH3742> at the other<WH2088> end;<WH7098> he made<WH6213> the cherubim<WH3742> [of one piece] with the mercy<WH3727> seat<WH3727> at the two<WH8147> ends.<WH7098>

And the cherubim<WH3742> had<WH1961> [their] wings<WH3671> spread<WH6566> upward,<WH4605> covering<WH5526> the mercy<WH3727> seat<WH3727> with their wings,<WH3671> with their faces<WH6440> toward<WH413> each<WH376> other;<WH251> the faces<WH6440> of the cherubim<WH3742> were toward<WH413> the mercy<WH3727> seat.<WH3727>
Then he made<WH6213> the table<WH7979> of acacia<WH7848> wood,<WH6086> two cubits<WH520> long<WH753> and a cubit<WH520> wide<WH7341> and one and a half<WH2677> cubits<WH520> high.<WH6967>
And he overlaid<WH6823> it with pure<WH2889> gold,<WH2091> and made<WH6213> a gold<WH2091> molding<WH2213> for it all<WH5439> around.<WH5439>
And he made<WH6213> a rim<WH4526> for it of a handbreadth<WH2948> all<WH5439> around,<WH5439> and made<WH6213> a gold<WH2091> molding<WH2213> for its rim<WH4526> all<WH5439> around.<WH5439>
And he cast<WH3332> four<WH702> gold<WH2091> rings<WH2885> for it and put<WH5414> the rings<WH2885> on the four<WH702> corners<WH6285> that were on its four<WH702> feet.<WH7272>
Close<WH5980> by the rim<WH4526> were the rings,<WH2885> the holders<WH1004> for the poles<WH905> to carry<WH5375> the table.<WH7979>
And he made<WH6213> the poles<WH905> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086> and overlaid<WH6823> them with gold,<WH2091> to carry<WH5375> the table.<WH7979>

And he made<WH6213> the utensils<WH3627> which<WH834> were on the table,<WH7979> its dishes<WH7086> and its pans<WH3709> and its bowls<WH4518> and its jars,<WH7184> with which<WH834> to pour<WH5258> out libations,<WH5258> of pure<WH2889> gold.<WH2091>

Then he made<WH6213> the lampstand<WH4501> of pure<WH2889> gold.<WH2091> He made<WH6213> the lampstand<WH4501> of hammered<WH4749> work,<WH4749> its base<WH3409> and its shaft;<WH7070> its cups,<WH1375> its bulbs<WH3730> and its flowers<WH6525> were [of one piece] with it.

And there were six<WH8337> branches<WH7070> going<WH3318> out of its sides;<WH6654> three<WH7969> branches<WH7070> of the lampstand<WH4501> from the one<WH259> side<WH6654> of it, and three<WH7969> branches<WH7070> of the lampstand<WH4501> from the other<WH8145> side<WH6654> of it;

three<WH7969> cups<WH1375> shaped<WH8246> like<WH8246> almond<WH8246> [blossoms,] a bulb<WH3730> and a flower<WH6525> in one<WH259> branch,<WH7070> and three<WH7969> cups<WH1375> shaped<WH8246> like<WH8246> almond<WH8246> [blossoms,] a bulb<WH3730> and a flower<WH6525> in the other<WH259> branch<WH7070> – so<WH3651> for the six<WH8337> branches<WH7070> going<WH3318> out of the lampstand.<WH4501>
And in the lampstand<WH4501> [there were] four<WH702> cups<WH1375> shaped<WH8246> like<WH8246> almond<WH8246> [blossoms,] its bulbs<WH3730> and its flowers;<WH6525>

and a bulb<WH3730> was under<WH8478> the [first] pair<WH8147> of branches<WH7070> [coming<WH3318>] out of it, and a bulb<WH3730> under<WH8478> the [second] pair<WH8147> of branches<WH7070> [coming] out of it, and a bulb<WH3730> under<WH8478> the [third] pair<WH8147> of branches<WH7070> [coming] out of it, for the six<WH8337> branches<WH7070> coming out of the lampstand.
Their bulbs<WH3730> and their branches<WH7070> were [of one piece] with it; the whole<WH3605> of it [was] a single<WH259> hammered<WH4749> work<WH4749> of pure<WH2889> gold.<WH2091>
And he made<WH6213> its seven<WH7651> lamps<WH5216> with its snuffers<WH4457> and its trays<WH4289> of pure<WH2889> gold.<WH2091>
He made<WH6213> it and all<WH3605> its utensils<WH3627> from a talent<WH3603> of pure<WH2889> gold.<WH2091>

Then he made<WH6213> the altar<WH4196> of incense<WH7004> of acacia<WH7848> wood:<WH6086> a cubit<WH520> long<WH753> and a cubit<WH520> wide,<WH7341> square,<WH7251> and two cubits<WH520> high;<WH6967> its horns<WH7161> were [of one piece] with it.

And he overlaid<WH6823> it with pure<WH2889> gold,<WH2091> its top<WH1406> and its sides<WH7023> all<WH5439> around,<WH5439> and its horns;<WH7161> and he made<WH6213> a gold<WH2091> molding<WH2213> for it all<WH5439> around.<WH5439>

And he made<WH6213> two<WH8147> golden<WH2091> rings<WH2885> for it under<WH8478> its molding,<WH2213> on its two<WH8147> sides<WH6763> – on opposite<WH8147> sides<WH6654> – as holders<WH1004> for poles<WH905> with which<WH1992> to carry<WH5375> it.
And he made<WH6213> the poles<WH905> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086> and overlaid<WH6823> them with gold.<WH2091>
And he made<WH6213> the holy<WH6944> anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081> and the pure,<WH2889> fragrant<WH5561> incense<WH7004> of spices,<WH5561> the work<WH4639> of a perfumer.<WH7543>
